revision.text:
{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_BrainScream}} {{doomwiki|A_BrainScream}} '''A_BrainScream'''
(no parameters)
Starts the [[Classes:BossBrain|brain]] explosion and plays the sound “brain/death” at full volume.
== Examples == This example is taken from Doom's Icon of Sin.
Death: BBRN A 100 '''A_BrainScream''' BBRN AA 10 BBRN A -1 [[A_BrainDie]] Stop
{{DEFAULTSORT:BrainScream}}[[category:Decorate Classic attack functions]][[Category:Icon of Sin]]
